mapper.sql: act_goods_id, activity_id, goods_id, rbc_amount, pad_time,status, creater, create_time, modifier, modify_time, reorder, remark, enable_status, lottery_count, activity_price, activity_img, coupon_type_id, activity_show_price,pad_time_two
mapper.select: select goods_id,array_to_string(group_concat(coupon_type_id),' | ') as coupon_type_ids, array_to_string(group_concat(type_name),' | ') as coupon_type_names from rf_activity_goods rag left join rf_coupon_type rct on rag.coupon_type_id = rct.type_id where activity_id = #{activityId,jdbcType=INTEGER} group by goods_id

select
distinct
from rf_activity_goods
order by ${orderByClause}

update rf_activity_goods
activity_id = (case when activity_id is null then #{record.activityId,jdbcType=INTEGER} else activity_id + #{record.activityId,jdbcType=INTEGER} end ),
goods_id = (case when goods_id is null then #{record.goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER} else goods_id + #{record.goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER} end ),
